refactorings_applied: DRY: Extract computeMatchedPaths utility function to eliminate code duplication between useFileSearch.ts and FileTreeView.tsx
SRP: Extract SearchConfig interface to reduce searchDirectory parameter count from 9 to 4
SRP: Extract processFileEntry function from searchDirectory for single responsibility
Remove unnecessary handleModeChange callback wrapper in SearchBar.tsx
message: Refactoring completed successfully. Applied DRY principle by extracting computeMatchedPaths utility function. Applied SRP by introducing SearchConfig interface and extracting processFileEntry function. All tests pass (2164 tests), ESLint and TypeScript errors: 0.
